about.p1: BeeProductive is a free and easy-to-use habit tracker that helps you build a routine of positive, life changing habits. Set personal goals, track your progress, and motivate yourself to achieve new heights!
about.p2: BeeProductive habit tracker is here to help you make the most of your task management and get things done. Whether you want to break bad, arrange a good habits list, or set task reminder, our app will guide and motivate you on a daily basis. Achieve your goals with our task tracker!

advantage.p1: Subscribe to Premium for even more great features to boost your personal productivity:
advantage.p2:
- Unlimited number of habits
 - Improved reminders for your task and habit lists
 - Motivating stats for each habit
advantage.p3: There are many things you may want to improve. Productive will help you track your habits, like taking your pills regularly, exercising, or keeping to a diet. It can also be used by people who have difficulty focusing and concentrating, allowing them to create their own daily tasks and habits to work on.

swiper.text_1: The best app I've ever come across. Now my working day is planned and I can breathe freely.
swiper.text_2: I have a very busy schedule and I always had trouble planning my tasks and often forgot a lot. With this app I became superman.
swiper.text_3: I am a creative person and often delve into my creative work. BeeProductive helped me develop my own strategy for a productive day.
swiper.text_4: I haven't had time for myself for a long time. Everyday routine habits simply exhausted me. This app helped me to do my daily tasks.
